engines.name: Staged Task Decomposition Engine
engines.description: Performs exactly ONE structural decomposition pass on input tasks, reducing by one meaningful layer without recursively decomposing to AEBs
engines.objective: Reduce decomposition depth by exactly one level without trying to reach AEBs unless they naturally occur at this layer
rules: If input already satisfies AEB definition: return unchanged and indicate no further decomposition required
If input decomposes directly into AEBs: decompose into those AEBs without further reduction
If input is higher-level composite workflow: decompose into next structural layer of coherent sub-tasks
Do NOT split validation from execution unless already implied
Do NOT split into trivial mechanical operations
Do NOT fully expand orchestration trees
Do NOT decompose deeper than one structural layer

properties: Contains no validation or error handling
Can be implemented as a single function or API call

example.next_stage_expectation: Yes/No - Will the next decomposition produce AEBs?
